name: Grapple Square
description:
Grapple Square is about, you guessed it! Squares! move with A and D, jump with space, and use the left mouse button to grapple, once grappled, you can change the direction with A and D. Enjoy!

Credits:

Programming - RishToonz

Art - SpeedyMathias

Music - Patrick De Arteaga(https://patrickdearteaga.com/)

SFX - Bfxr

Engine - Unity

Art - aseprite
